Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich has on Saturday, Feb. 26, 2022 suddenly handed over the ‚Äústewardship and care‚Äù of the Premier League club to its charitable foundation trustees. The move came after a member of the British parliament called for the Russian billionaire to hand over the club in the wake of Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine. (AP Photo/Matt Dunham, File)
